attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To proceed with this bill reverts back to frankenstein, and hitler. It is against all christian teaching. There must be some other way these disease can be irradicated. The money spent would be massive and is against animal and human rights.The  teaching,as a christian is against My belief. To proceed with embriology bill. I pray to god this bill does not proceed. thank you.Born 21.6.43
